import React from 'react'; import { ChevronDown, MoreHorizontal, Eye, Globe, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; // Định nghĩa styles nội tuyến để dễ dàng tùy chỉnh const styles = { container: 'landing-list-container w-full overflow-x-auto', table: 'landing-table w-full border-collapse', thead: 'bg-gray-100', th: 'p-3 text-left font-semibold text-gray-700 border-b', checkboxColumn: 'w-12', nameColumn: 'w-1/3', statusColumn: 'w-1/4', metricColumn: 'w-1/6 text-center', actionsColumn: 'w-20 text-right', tbody: '', noData: 'p-4 text-center text-gray-500', row: 'landing-row hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors', checkboxCell: 'p-2', pageInfo: 'flex flex-col', pageName: 'font-medium text-gray-900', pageUrl: 'text-blue-500 text-sm hover:underline', statusContainer: 'flex flex-col items-start', status: 'status inline-block px-2 py-1 text-sm rounded-full', statusInfo: 'flex items-center gap-1 text-gray-500 text-xs mt-1', statusIcon: 'text-gray-400', timestamp: 'ml-1', moreBtn: 'p-1 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 rounded focus:outline-none', contextMenu: 'absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 bg-white border rounded shadow-lg', contextMenuButton: 'w-full text-left p-2 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded text-sm', }; // Component LandingList const LandingList = ({ landingPages, filteredPages, handleMoreClick, menuOpen, handlePreviewPage, handleEditPage, handlePublishPage, handleDeletePage, }) => { // Dữ liệu mẫu nếu filteredPages trống (dùng để demo) const sampleData = [ { _id: '68c9bedb57d0b3d0bb8dbf68', id: 'page_id_1', name: 'Căn hộ Quận 7 cao cấp', url: 'https://landinghub-iconic.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/index.html', status: 'ĐÃ XUẤT BẢN', lastUpdated: '15/09/2025, 17:00', views: 1500, zalo_chatbot_script_id: 'zalo123456', user_id: '68c55cf453d7f4e8ae465912', }, ]; const displayPages = filteredPages.length > 0 ? filteredPages : sampleData; return (
